items.sentence: The river is six miles deep in some areas and the only way to cross it is using a pulley and a rope.
A noob once met Betty and while desperately trying hard not to get killed, ended up killing himself.
One of my boots fell off the boat, so I jumped into the water and swam as fast as I could to get it.
When you're angry, count to ten before you say anything. If you're very angry, count to one hundred.
As an overweight woman, Mary has experienced many incidents of people judging her based on her size.
